context.rdfs:comment: An event happening at a certain time and location, such as a concert, lecture, or festival. Ticketing information may be added via the offers property. Repeated events may be structured as separate Event objects.
context.rdfs:label: Event

properties.rdfs:comment:
A work featured in some event, e.g. exhibited in an ExhibitionEvent.
       Specific subproperties are available for workPerformed (e.g. a play), or a workPresented (a Movie at a ScreeningEvent).
properties.rdfs:label: workFeatured

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of attendee places for an event that remain unallocated.
properties.rdfs:label: remainingAttendeeCapacity

properties.rdfs:comment: The main performer or performers of the event—for example, a presenter, musician, or actor.
properties.rdfs:label: performers

properties.rdfs:comment: An Event that is part of this event. For example, a conference event includes many presentations, each of which is a subEvent of the conference.
properties.rdfs:label: subEvent

properties.rdfs:comment: Events that are a part of this event. For example, a conference event includes many presentations, each subEvents of the conference.
properties.rdfs:label: subEvents

properties.rdfs:comment: A person or organization attending the event.
properties.rdfs:label: attendee

properties.rdfs:comment: A work performed in some event, for example a play performed in a TheaterEvent.
properties.rdfs:label: workPerformed

properties.rdfs:comment: An eventStatus of an event represents its status; particularly useful when an event is cancelled or rescheduled.
properties.rdfs:label: eventStatus

properties.rdfs:comment: An event that this event is a part of. For example, a collection of individual music performances might each have a music festival as their superEvent.
properties.rdfs:label: superEvent

properties.rdfs:comment: Used in conjunction with eventStatus for rescheduled or cancelled events. This property contains the previously scheduled start date. For rescheduled events, the startDate property should be used for the newly scheduled start date. In the (rare) case of an event that has been postponed and rescheduled multiple times, this field may be repeated.
properties.rdfs:label: previousStartDate

properties.rdfs:comment: The CreativeWork that captured all or part of this Event.
properties.rdfs:label: recordedIn

properties.rdfs:comment: A performer at the event—for example, a presenter, musician, musical group or actor.
properties.rdfs:label: performer
